text.div:
ColorectalCancerOperationType

This is the code indicates the type of operation for the colorectal cancer.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    235326000 Right hemicolectomy
    174071004 Extended right hemicolectomy
    26925005 Transverse colectomy
    82619000 Left hemicolectomy
    4558008 Anterior resection
    265414003 Abdominoperineal resection
    174059005 Proctocolectomy
    307666008 Total colectomy with ileorectal anastomosis
    16564004 Hartmann’s procedure
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-crc-operation-type
